nodes.text: Around 44 BBY, political activists on Galidraan were branded as rebels by the planet's governor. The governor hired Mandalorian mercenaries under Jango Fett to destroy the rebels, but was in truth simply operating under the directive of Tor Vizsla and his anti-Mandalorian Death Watch. Fett and his mercenaries killed all of the activists just prior to the Battle of Galidraan.
